Question
========

At the top of an R Markdown document, properties are specified in [YAML](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/YAML). The YAML option in R Markdown that allows code chunks throughout the rendered HTML document to be shown and hidden **by the viewer** is called:

Answerlist
----------
* `code_folding`
* `echo = TRUE`
* `echo = FALSE`
* `echo = "show"`
* `code_hiding`

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* True. 
* False. This shows all code. 
* False. This hides all code from the viewer.
* False. This doesn't work.
* False. This is made up.
